subject: Revert "split API set application API and service API"
commitMessage:
Revert "split API set application API and service API"

This reverts commit 3cd43324a0c9e1c83cc714caf6186d8faee1382e.

Change-Id: If12968cb5167894139c565f1489999f578e8c7f9

comments.message: Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 1:

Really?!?  Submitted, reviewed and merged all by the same person without comment from anyone else?  That is not what I would consider a high quality development process.

Patch Set 1:

Please consider this again,.

Badge should be merged into the tizen branch to build the provider master successfully.

Youngsub ko maintains this and he may verify it using commercial binary.

If there is no rollback of other developer's patch, consider this again to merge into the tizen branch.

I'll send mail to youngsub go again.

Patch Set 1:

It was not about the problem of the patch itself. It was about the review process. Please, re-submit and follow the review process. Merging his own commit without any review of other developers is not allowed.

Patch Set 1: Reverted

This patchset was reverted in change: I1c9d341c3cad4fbedc35483c6af5823d0c5b69f5

subject: Add multi-user support
commitMessage:
Add multi-user support

Also:
+ do not generate a "badge" RPM since its only purpose was to install
  the db files. This has been moved in the "libbadge" RPM which uses it.

Bug-Tizen: PTREL-333
Change-Id: I782e5fab2ed3ad5e107b406eca01b3aee8af677f
Signed-off-by: Kévin THIERRY <kevin.thierry@open.eurogiciel.org>

subject: Cleanup packaging and install database in %install
commitMessage:
Cleanup packaging and install database in %install

- Move sql data into a seperate file
- install database in %install section
- cleanup %post

Signed-off-by: Anas Nashif <anas.nashif@intel.com>
